casebody.data:
IN RE: STYLES, Jr. 158P18-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 24, 2018 Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Robert Lee Styles, for Styles, Robert Lee (Jr.). Sarah Kirkman, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 11th of September 2018 by Petitioner to Reconsider:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 24th of October 2018."
